channel.title: Comments on: September 2013 – First Contact
channel.description: A user group for Agile, XP, Software Craftsmanship and Software Development, based in Stafford

item.title: By: Neil Kidd
item.dc:creator: Neil Kidd
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/agile/september-2013-first-contact/#comment-3460">Trevor Adams</a>.
Hi Trevor, We missed you too! It would be great to see you - as it happens we didn't do as we planned. See the <a href="/agile/september-2013-retrospective/" title="September 2013 – Retrospective" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">follow up post</a> for more info. We have a guest speaker lined up for October - announcement coming soon.
Neil.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Trevor Adams.

Hi Trevor,
We missed you too! It would be great to see you – as it happens we didn’t do as we planned. See the follow up post for more info.
We have a guest speaker lined up for October – announcement coming soon.

Neil.

item.title: By: Trevor Adams
item.dc:creator: Trevor Adams
item.description: I'm really gutted that I missed this session. How did it go?
item.content:encoded: I’m really gutted that I missed this session. How did it go?
